Two sobering reads.
I know trialists will recoil at this, but these are strong arguments for open data.
Also wonder whether systematic reviews and meta-analyses should sit higher in the strength of evidence triangle than a large well-conducted RCT https://t.co/4ewPBUy1jl

Why open data is critical? The real-time forecast of flooding is not open data and only accessible to partners. Using data from a EU funded satellite monitoring system and it‚Äôs not open data.
